title: A Say in your community with the Australian Assistance Plan
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community development - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public welfare - Australia
description: Made for he Social Welfare Commission and Department of Social welfare, the film explains the concept and illustrates the benefits available to community groups throughout Australia under the Australian Assistance Plan, a revolutionary concept in the identification of community need areas.
